Prerequisites¶

The user guide assumes that the reader has working knowledge of Instruction List programming (IL) and its terminologies. Interested readers are encouraged to check out the reference book included in reference. Throughout this guide, we will use IEC 61131-3 specific terminologies like resources, configuration, tasks, functions, function blocks and programs which are described in detail in the referenced book.

The user guide also assumes that the reader is familar with google protobufs and GRPC and their associated terminology.

  • For additional reference on protocol buffers please refer here.
  • For additional reference on GRPC please refer here.
